title: Large-Scale ClickFix Phishing Attacks Target Hotel Systems with PureRAT Malware
description: Cybersecurity researchers have called attention to a massive phishing campaign targeting the hospitality industry that lures hotel managers to ClickFix-style pages and harvest their credentials by deploying malware like PureRAT.
